LanguageData.SS_Weapon_FNFALGL_Gun.label: FN FAL + M203
LanguageData.SS_Weapon_FNFALGL_Gun.description: Ancient military battle rifle firing a full-power rifle cartridge. Famous for being the right hand of the free world. With an underbarrel M203 40mm grenade launcher.
LanguageData.SS_Weapon_FNFALGL_Gun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.SS_Weapon_FNFALGL_Gun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.SS_Weapon_FNFALGL_Gun.tools.2.label: muzzle
